node.title: Life with Limits
node.description: Limits are not popular these days.  We all want to believe that we have unlimited potential, time, money, and abilities.  But the problem is that we all have limits – and even Jesus lived a life conforming to the limits that humanity and His heavenly Father placed upon Him.  In this message we explore a key component of emotional well-being – the ability to live life with boundaries and to recognize our own limits.
